site_name: Land at 370 High Road and 54-68 Dudden Hill Lane, London, NW10
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to conditions 16 (construction logistics plan (CLP)), 17 (construction method statement and construction environmental management plan) and 18 (phasing plan) of Full Planning Permission reference 23/3187 dated 17 October, 2024, for Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment to provide six mixed use blocks, comprising residential dwellings (Class C3); the provision of industrial floorspace, gym floorspace, retail floorspace and flexible commercial floorspace; associated vehicular access; car and cycle parking spaces; refuse storage; amenity space; substation and landscaping, subject to Deed of Agreement dated 16th October 2024 under Section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990 as amended.
